short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracts main keywords from the current webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keyword Extractor
Transform your browsing experience with Keyword Extractor!

Are you tired of scrolling through web pages to find the essential keywords? Whether you're a student, researcher, or content creator, Keyword Extractor helps you effortlessly extract and compile the most relevant keywords from any webpage with just one click.

Key Features:

Instant Keyword Extraction: Click the "Extract Keywords" button to retrieve keywords from the page's title, subtitles, and highlighted text.
User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a sleek and modern design that makes extracting keywords quick and easy.
Copy to Clipboard: Instantly copy the extracted keywords with a single click, saving you time and effort.
Support Creators: If you find this extension helpful, consider supporting the developer through the Donate via PayPal button!
Why Use Keyword Extractor?

Boost Productivity: Save time by quickly gathering relevant keywords for your projects, research, or SEO needs.
Focus on Important Information: The extension highlights the most significant words, allowing you to concentrate on what truly matters.
Flexible and Convenient: Works on any webpage, making it a versatile tool for anyone who needs to extract information.
How to Use:

Install the Keyword Extractor extension.
Navigate to any webpage you want to extract keywords from.
Click the Keyword Extractor icon in your toolbar.
Press the "Extract Keywords" button, and watch the magic happen!
Copy your keywords with a click and paste them wherever you need.
Download Keyword Extractor today and streamline your keyword extraction process!
